00025 #ifndef SYX_PLUGINS_H
00026 #define SYX_PLUGINS_H
00027 
00028 #include "syx-platform.h"
00029 #include "syx-interp.h"
00030 
00031 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00032 
00033 typedef struct SyxPluginEntry SyxPluginEntry;
00034 
00036 struct SyxPluginEntry
00037 {
00039   syx_string name;
00041   syx_pointer handle;
00042 };
00043 
00044 /* Dealing with dynamic libraries */
00045 
00046 EXPORT extern syx_pointer syx_library_open (syx_symbol location);
00047 EXPORT extern syx_pointer syx_library_symbol (syx_pointer handle, syx_symbol name);
00048 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_library_close (syx_pointer handle);
00049 
00050 /* Managing plugins */
00051 
00052 typedef syx_bool (* SyxPluginInitializeFunc) (void);
00053 typedef void (* SyxPluginFinalizeFunc) (void);
00054 
00055 EXPORT extern void syx_plugins_init (void);
00056 EXPORT extern void syx_plugins_quit (void);
00057 EXPORT extern void syx_plugin_finalize_all (void);
00058 EXPORT extern syx_pointer syx_plugin_load (syx_symbol name);
00059 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_plugin_unload (syx_symbol name);
00060 EXPORT extern syx_pointer syx_plugin_symbol (syx_symbol plugin_name, syx_symbol func_name);
00061 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_plugin_call_interp (SyxInterpState *es, SyxOop method);
00062 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_plugin_call (SyxInterpState *es, syx_symbol plugin_name, syx_symbol func_name, SyxOop method);
00063 
00064 SYX_END_DECLS
00065 
00066 #endif /* SYX_PLUGINS_H */
